query: company looking for social media management agency
content: We're Hiring! Are you a creative powerhouse in Miami ready to run the show? GLP Marketing, a specialized SEO agency for law firms, is looking for a part-time Content & Social Media Manager to become the creative engine behind our brand. This isn't just another content job. We're building a personal media company from the ground up, and we need an all-in-one creative operator to work directly with our CEO and turn vision into reality. This role is for you if you're a pro at: ✅ Turning raw ideas into polished LinkedIn posts, X threads, and newsletters. ✅ Managing and growing social channels with engaging content. ✅ Editing sharp, fast-paced short-form videos (Reels, Shorts, etc.). ✅ Creating clean, on-brand graphics in Canva or Figma. Key Responsibilities: ✍️ Content Creation: Own our content calendar and write copy that converts. 📱Social Media Management: Manage daily posting, engagement, and analytics across LinkedIn, X, Instagram, and YouTube. 🎬 Video Production: Edit and repurpose video content, and assist with in-person shoots in Miami. ⚙️ Content Ops: Master our "Content Waterfall" system to turn one pillar idea into 20+ pieces of content weekly. The Details: Location: Miami, FL (Hybrid remote/in-person) Commitment: Part-Time Contract (~20 hrs/week) Why Join GLP? High Impact: Be the creative force behind a fast-growing agency. Direct Access: Work 1-on-1 with the CEO to shape our brand voice. Flexibility: Enjoy a mix of remote work and in-person collaboration. Huge Growth Potential: This role is designed to scale with the company. This is a rare opportunity to own a brand's entire media presence without being just a cog in a big machine. If you're ready to build something special, we want to talk. Ready to apply? Find the full job description and submit your application here: https://lnkd.in/dENvbfCt We can't wait to see your work! hashtag # Hiring hashtag # MarketingJobs hashtag # SocialMediaManager hashtag # ContentManager hashtag # MiamiJobs hashtag # MiamiMarketing hashtag # CreativeJobs hashtag # SEO hashtag # LegalMarketing hashtag # PartTime

query: need to outsource social media marketing for our business
content: 🚫 Stop hiring “Social Media Managers” when what you actually need is an entire Marketing Team! Lately, I keep seeing job posts for “Social Media Manager” roles… But the requirements? 👇 🎬 Expert in Video Editing 🎨 Pro-level Graphic Designer ✍️ Master Copywriter 📈 Trendspotter 🔍 SEO Expert 💰 Performance Marketer 📊 Data Analyst 💡 Content Creator And of course — “Must manage multiple platforms, stay on top of trends, and create viral campaigns.” Let’s be honest — are you hiring one person or an entire department? 😅 Social Media Management isn’t a do-it-all role anymore. When you expect one person to handle the work of five professionals, you’re not saving money — you’re setting them (and your business) up to fail. Here’s the reality 👇 ⭐ Social Media Managers – manage strategy, calendars & growth ⭐ Social Media Marketers – run ads & campaigns ⭐ Content Creators – create engaging stories ⭐ Graphic Designers – bring visuals to life Each of these roles demands unique skills, creativity, and time to truly shine. So next time you’re hiring, ask yourself — Do you want a Social Media Manager or an entire marketing team in one person? 💭

query: need to outsource social media marketing for our business
content: 🤔 Do you really need a Social Media Manager? Let’s find out! After my last post, some people asked — “But do I actually need a social media manager for my business?” Here’s the truth 👇 If you’re handling your brand’s social media yourself and still trying to run the business — chances are, you’re stretched too thin. Here’s who should consider hiring a Social Media Manager: 💼 1. Business Owners who have no time to plan, post, and engage. If your content feels inconsistent or rushed — it’s time to delegate. 🎯 2. Brands that want to grow beyond organic posting. An SMM can plan paid ads, influencer tie-ups, and campaigns that align with your goals. 📊 3. Startups trying to build visibility fast. Early social traction = brand trust. A good SMM helps you stand out from the noise. ✨ 4. Personal Brands looking to position themselves as thought leaders. If you’re a coach, consultant, or creator — consistent, strategic content can 10x your presence. 📱 5. Businesses ready to scale but lacking a content strategy. Posting without a plan won’t take you far. Strategy + creativity = growth. So, do you need one? If your answer sounds like “I don’t have time,” “I’m not consistent,” or “I’m not seeing growth” — then yes, it’s time to bring a social media manager on board. Because managing social media isn’t just about posting — it’s about positioning. 💬 hashtag # SocialMediaManager hashtag # BrandBuilding hashtag # DigitalMarketing hashtag # ContentStrategy hashtag # BusinessGrowth hashtag # SocialMediaTips hashtag # MarketingStrategy hashtag # SmallBusiness hashtag # Entrepreneurship hashtag # learndigitalmarketingwithhasti

query: require social media management services for our brand
content: Social Media Managers are not customer service reps. But somehow, many brands still expect one person to reply to DMs, design graphics, write copy, manage communities, shoot videos, plan strategy, and run ads — all in one role. I used to accept roles like that, thinking it was “part of the hustle.” But it wasn’t. It was confusion disguised as opportunity. The problem isn’t that SMMs aren’t skilled — the problem is lack of structure and clarity. That’s why I now onboard every brand with a clear breakdown of deliverables, communication flow, and role expectations. No more burnout. No more scope creep. If you’d like access to the SMM Client Onboarding Template I use to stay organized, set boundaries, and work smarter with brands — comment “ONBOARD” and I’ll share it with you.

query: require social media management services for our brand
content: 🫠 Just had a call for a “Social Media Manager” role… but honestly, it sounded like they were trying to assemble the Avengers — on a single salary. 😂 When I asked about the responsibilities, here’s the list they gave me: ✨ Strategy 🎨 Graphic Design 🧑‍💻 Content Creation ✍️ Copywriting 🎥 Reels + Video Editing 📈 SEO 🤝 Influencer Marketing 📊 Analytics & Reporting 💸 Meta Ads So I politely asked — “Are you hiring a Manager… or a full-service Marketing Agency?” …and the silence on the other end said it all. 😶 Let’s get one thing straight — A Social Media Manager manages. We strategize, plan, and lead creative direction. We collaborate with design, content, and ad teams — We’re the glue that holds the process together, not the entire toolkit. 💬 Dear companies, If you want great work — respect the role, the skills, and the human behind it. 🙌

content: Hi Folks, Greetings of the day!!! We are hiring for Inside Sales Executive at Taxilla Kindly go through the below job description for your reference. We are looking for a highly motivated Inside Sales Executive with 1–3 years of experience in B2B SaaS sales, primarily focused on lead generation. The ideal candidate will be responsible for identifying, engaging, and qualifying potential clients through multi-channel outreach including email campaigns, LinkedIn, cold calling, and social media campaigns. Key Responsibilities: •	Generate and qualify high-quality B2B leads through outbound activities •	Run targeted email campaigns using automation tools (e.g., Instantly,) •	Conduct cold calls to engage prospects and pitch product value •	Leverage LinkedIn and other social channels to connect with and nurture decision-makers •	Maintain accurate lead and activity data in the CRM (e.g., Zoho, HubSpot, Salesforce) •	Schedule discovery calls or demos for the sales team with qualified prospects •	Collaborate with the marketing and product teams for campaign messaging and targeting •	Track, report, and improve lead generation metrics on a weekly basis Required Skills & Experience: •	1–3 years of proven experience in inside sales, lead generation, or SDR roles in a B2B SaaS company •	Hands-on experience with cold calling, email outreach, LinkedIn prospecting, and social selling •	Proficiency in using CRM tools and outreach platforms (e.g., Apollo.io , Lusha, Zoho CRM, HubSpot) •	Strong written and verbal communication skills •	High energy, goal-driven, and ability to handle rejections professionally •	Understanding of SaaS products, B2B buyer behavior, and lead qualification frameworks (e.g., BANT, CHAMP) Interested candidates can share profiles to smala@adaequare.com
